summary: This module implements a centralized catalog that stores dataset objects and provides a unified interface for loading, saving, and managing them throughout an application. It handles configuration resolution, versioning, and offers a read‑only view of pre‑loaded datasets.
business_intent: Facilitate consistent and reproducible data access in data pipelines by offering a single point of reference for all I/O operations, supporting version control, credential management, and configuration‑driven dataset definitions.
